channel.title: Raymond Hung's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Raymond Hung's Blog

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am Yu-Chuan Hung and you can call me Raymond if you like. Currently, I am a data engineer and continuously learn many aspects of data engineering, including, data orchestration tools, streaming processing platforms (e.g., Apache Kafka), and NoSQL (e.g,. Apache Cassandra). This blog is a place where I record my learning experiences, and side projects Since 2019, I jumped into academia and worked as full-time research assistant. Considering the main duty of this job is to clean and analyze data from many sources as well as process stuff related to participants, which is time-consuming and error-prone, I proactively started to learn Python, R, and SQL to reduce working time and improve working performance.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Nothing to see here… Move along!
